Tips and Strategies

Maximize Your Gaming Experience!

General Tips

Tip 1: Focus on Performance

Token generation is based on your performance metrics. Try to maximize score, minimize time, and achieve perfect runs when possible!

Tip 2: Hunt for Gems

Not all games are created equal. Some variants have much better parameters than others. Browse through the collection to find games with exploitable mechanics!

Tip 3: Use CheatEngine Wisely

CheatEngine budget is limited, so focus on modifications that have the biggest impact on token generation. The system will even recommend optimal changes!

Tip 4: Record Quality Demos

Your VM success rate depends on demo quality. Practice games until you have a reliable strategy before recording for automation.

Tip 5: Diversify Your Portfolio

Running VMs on multiple different games provides more stable passive income than relying on one game type.

Advanced Strategies

Strategy: The Optimization Loop

1. Find a promising game variant

2. Beat it once to unlock CheatEngine access

3. Optimize parameters for maximum tokens

4. Practice the optimized version

5. Record a reliable demo

6. Assign to VM for passive generation

7. Use tokens to upgrade systems

8. Repeat with harder games!

Strategy: Neural Core Efficiency

Each completed game adds a bullet. Focus on beating many games rather than replaying the same ones. A larger arsenal means faster Neural Core progression!

Strategy: Active vs Passive Balance

Manual play generates more tokens than VMs, but VMs generate passively. Find the right balance - play manually while your VMs work in the background!
